titleStmt.title: To the hon[ble]. the House of Commons now assembled in the high court of Parliament, the humble petition of John Lilburne Leift. [sic] Colonel. In all humilitie.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Copy at reel 2258:2b filmed following: To the right honourable the Lords and Commons now assembled in Parliament, the humble petition of the prisoners in the Fleet.
Reproductions of original in: Lincoln's Inn (London, England). Library.
